content.p: Thanks for reading this welcome message and visiting the School of Media, Languages and Cultures. Please have a look around to see what we do here in the school and visit our Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter pages for more information. We are a vibrant school offering degrees in Liberal Arts and International Communication Studies with a dedicated team teaching foreign languages as well as a postgraduate programme offering MA and PhD degrees. We enrol students from across Malaysia, the region and the wider world and offer a unique international educational experience. The University of Nottingham is a pioneer in global education, with campuses in China and the UK, and a curriculum to match. Students enjoy state-of-the-art learning and teaching resources, superb sports facilities, excellent living accommodation, and a green campus. Our team bring together specialisations in journalism, cultural studies, social media, cinema, music and performance, and translation, with a particular emphasis on Southeast Asia. We pride ourselves on our inclusive education and progressive research agendas that engage contemporary cultural and political issues. If you are seeking out an expert, have a look through our staff pages and get in touch. Sandeep Ray Interim Head of School telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8693 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8020
